description: This Dart source file defines theme configuration and style constants for a Flutter app, including color palettes, radius and spacing constants, and a customized ThemeData object for an 'Ocean Professional' theme.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Holds all brand and utility color tokens used across the app, aggregated as static constants.

classes.name: Radii
classes.description: Defines standard radius values for UI elements, such as input fields and buttons.

classes.name: Spacing
classes.description: Defines spacing scale constants for consistent layout and padding.

methods.name: oceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: A ThemeData object configuring the theme for the app with specific color schemes, text styles, button styles, input decorations, and component themes to match design specifications.
